message:
Um… so is there an easy / standard way to remap the buttons of the Xbox 360 controller under Windows (XP, specifically) for playing older games?

I'm trying to play Psychonauts, and the game's built-in controller configuration doesn't pick up the triggers at all.  Ideally, I'd like to define the triggers to act as "buttons".

Easy or standard, no. But you could try these:

http://www.xpadder.com/
http://pinnaclegameprofiler.com

Hmm, thanks.  Those… do look like they'd do the trick, but I guess I'm not spending actual money to do something that I was just going to do on a lark anyway.  :-|

TO THE XBOX!
Weird, Xpadder used to be free.
